#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>

using namespace std;
long long int square;
int fi_after(int m,int n)
{
  int first=-1,second=0;
  for(int a=m;a<=n;++a)
  {
   square=5*a*a;
   double sqt1=sqrt(double(square-4));
   double sqt2=sqrt(double(square+4));
   long long int i=round(sqt1);
   long long int j=round(sqt2);
   if(i*i==square-4||j*j==square+4)
   {
    if(first==-1)
    {
      first=a;
    }
    else
    {
     second=a;
     break;
    }
   }
   }
   if(first==-1)
   return 0;
   if(second==0)
   return 1;
   int k=2,temp=first+second;
   for(int f=first,s=second;temp<=n;)
   {  
       ++k;  
       first=second;
       second=temp;      
       temp=first+second;
       
   }
   if(m==0)
   k--;
   return k;
   
}
int main()
{
 int a,b;
 while(cin>>a>>b)
 {
  if(a==0&&b==0)
  break;
 cout<<fi_after(a,b)<<"\n";
 }
 //system("pause");
 return 0;
}
